thread.title: Lula's Brazil presidential run in doubt after conviction upheld

title: Lula's Brazil presidential run in doubt after conviction upheld
text:
Lula's Brazil presidential run in doubt after conviction upheld   01:10 
A Brazilian appeals court unanimously upheld the corruption conviction of former President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday and added to his sentence, a major blow to the popular politician's plans to run again for the presidency this year.   
A Brazilian appeals court unanimously upheld the corruption conviction of former President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday and added to his sentence, a major blow to the popular politician's plans to run again for the presidency this year.  //reut.rs/2DE2tgc
